results.name: Decimal expansion of 4th Stieltjes constant gamma_4.
reference: S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, p. 166.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Stieltjes Constants
formula: Using the abbreviations a = log(z^2 + 1/4)/2, b = arctan(2*z) and c = cosh(Pi*z) then gamma_4 = -(Pi/5)*Integral_{0..infinity} (a^5-10*a^3*b^2+5*a*b^4)/c^2. The general case is for n>=0 (which includes Euler's gamma as gamma_0) gamma_n = (-Pi/ (n+1))*Integral_{0..infinity} sigma(n+1)/c^2, where sigma(n) = Sum_{k=0.. floor(n/2)}(-1)^k*binomial(n,2*k)*b^(2*k)*a^(n-2*k). - _Peter Luschny_, Apr 19 2018
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Jul 14 2003
